entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is waiting to be rescued from the Dursleys.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who has sent a letter to Harry with instructions for his rescue.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's snowy owl, which he has safely shut in its cage in preparation for the possibility of a journey.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The street where Harry lives with his cruel relatives, the Dursleys.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is rescuing Harry from the Dursleys, as indicated by Dumbledore's letter.
Harry owns Hedwig, his snowy owl.
